description: This file defines a React context component for managing user authentication state, including functions for login and logout, and persists user sessions using localStorage.

methods.name: AuthProvider({ children })
methods.description: React functional component that provides authentication state and functions to its children components.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Simulated login function that stores user info in state and localStorage if email and password are provided.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Function that clears user's authentication state and removes user data from localStorage.
